description: A tumor necrosis factor α (TNFα) antagonist used in the treatment of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD).
A group of inflammatory conditions of the colon and small intestine.
A gene involved in the metabolism of arachidonic acid and associated with inflammatory processes.
A gene that encodes the alpha subunit of the high-affinity IgE receptor, involved in allergic responses.
A gene that plays a critical role in the development of oligodendrocytes and is associated with various neurological processes.
